item.title: Fan-Out Orders using Amazon SNS and SQS
item.description: Lab Fan-Out Orders using Amazon SNS and SQS Creating an Amazon SNS Topic and Amazon SQS Queues Here’s a diagram of what you will build and configure in this lab step: In the search bar at the top, enter SNS and under Services, click the Simple Notification Service result: In the Create topic card on the right, in the Topic name textbox, enter new-orders and click Next step: The Create topic form will load. By default, the Type of topic selected will be Standard.
